# Abby Keller

------------------------------------------------------------------------

<figure style="float: right; margin: 0 0 1em 1em; width: 50%;">
  ![](assets/img/CNR-4815_square.JPG)
  </figure>

I am a PhD candidate and [DOE CSGF Fellow](https://www.krellinst.org/csgf/) in the UC Berkeley Department of [Environmental Science, Policy, and Management (ESPM)](https://ourenvironment.berkeley.edu/), where I study **statistical ecology** and **decision analysis** in the [Boettiger](https://www.carlboettiger.info/) and [de Valpine](https://devalpinegroup.org/) Labs. 

I have a master's degree in Marine Policy from the University of Washington and a bachelor's degree in Biology from Haverford College. I also have a background in molecular ecology and deep-sea biogeography.
